extendedInfo.description: Fifteen for 2, fifteen for 4, and a Pair for 6! With Aces Cribbage you can hone your cribbage skills anywhere, even when youâre on the go.In-game tutorials, hints, and a glossary help new players learn the rules and strategies of cribbage. To top it all off, the amazing graphics and realistic AI make this game fun and challenging for everyone.â¦â¦â¦ FEATURES â¦â¦â¦â¢ Option for Mugginsâ¢ New user tutorials and hintsâ¢ Glossary of commonly used Cribbage termsâ¢ Tracks tons of statisticsâ¦â¦â¦ Permissions requested and how they are used â¦â¦â¦â¢  android.permission.INTERNET: This permission is used to: 1) link to our website, 2) link to social networking like Twitter and Facebook, 3) update leaderboards, 4) collect gameplay data that we use to improve our games, and 5) allow ad networks that advertise within the app.â¢  android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: This permission is used primarily to check for a network connection before attempting to connect to our website.â¢  android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: This permission allows the app to access game data saved on an external storage device.â¢  android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE: This permission allows the app to establish a unique ID for our leaderboards that can be used across all of our applications.â¢  android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE: This permission allows the app to establish a unique ID for our leaderboards for tablets that do not have telephone information.â¢  android.permission.VIBRATE: This permission is used to access vibration functionality on the device..

reviews.title: Its pretty good
reviews.comment: I would much prefer a multi player platform. I do like that we can count our own cards. I will keep unless it starts trying to run in the background or I find a better multiplayer app for cards.
reviews.author: Susan Bosell

reviews.title: Excellent implementation but tablet support needs work
reviews.comment: The best cribbage game I\'ve found and while the most recent update has improved tablet support and now displays cleanly, it only uses the centre portion of the display leaving a wide black border around the game. Would be nice if it filed larger displays, even if it just scaled up the existing artwork.
reviews.author: Andrew Clark

reviews.title: Works well on the Samsung galaxy tab 2
reviews.comment: I am very pleased with this app. I am kind of a cribbage junky but don\'t always have someone available to join in a game.  Thanks.
reviews.author: Brian Cartwright

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: This is my favourite Cribbage app and it is the most fun. But the developers seem to be terrible with android (or at least the gs3).when you fast score, the 4 doesn\'t work, the 7 automatically doubles to 77.but it\'s still good, so please get itm right.
reviews.author: Mike Wrobel

reviews.title: Fun and easy to play
reviews.comment: Great graphics, easy to maneuver through game play, neat way to count points, and fun!
reviews.author: Teresa Sniezek

reviews.title: Great game that needs a display update!
reviews.comment: Love this version BUT it is not scaled for the screen and looks silly.   Recode the app for a modern android device and it is five stars plus!
reviews.author: Allen Bowman

reviews.title: Awesome cribbage game play it all the time
reviews.comment: Have recommended this game to my friends will continue to do so. Like it
reviews.author: John Short

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Great interface.  Even if you dont know how to play Cribbage, this game will help you learn.  Then you will be hooked.
reviews.author: Jen ATHS

reviews.comment: Crib is the best and Concrete makes the best playing crib game going. Updates are frustrating but OK a necessary evil. It only getts better.
reviews.author: Barry Huddlestun

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: I love the cribbage game!!!  you can set your own pace get all the help you need and learn as you go along. its been awhile since I\'ve played.
reviews.author: Alicia Holden

reviews.title: Pretty & Fun
reviews.comment: My husband started to teach me cribbage so I got this game to practice counting points. My only complaint is that it doesn\'t fit my screen, but it does on my husband\'s kindle (looks better too =( ) great for learning and pretty ui
reviews.author: Seana Kelsey

reviews.title: What Happened in the Update?
reviews.comment: I liked this game till the update. Now it only displays in a small area in the center of the screen of my tablet. Please fix or I\'ll need to find a replacement.
reviews.author: Donald Meyer

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Has a really nice layout and plenty of options. Just need computerized three\'s.
reviews.author: Zachary Bremer

reviews.title: Great phun!
reviews.comment: Would love to have multiplayer version,  also online play against whomever
reviews.author: nadene wolski

reviews.title: Doesn\'t display properly
reviews.comment: I have a HTC one and the game appears in a small box in the middle of the screen
reviews.author: Luke Kelly

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Great cribbage app. Love the counting options and the water marks on the table!
reviews.author: Laureen Geletchuk

reviews.title: Fun game, just not full screen. Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Fun game, just not full screen on Google nexus 7
reviews.author: adam eaton

reviews.title: Needs bugs fixed...
reviews.comment: Great app.....except for the most recent update. The 4 will not register on fast count, the 7 double taps so if you hit it, its always 77, and the loser deals feature in series doesn\'t work. You always cut for deal. Lastly, I know there are going to be ads in a free game, but do they have to cover up part of the cards?
reviews.author: Eric Hinnenkamp

reviews.title: Aces Cribbage
reviews.comment: Best cribbage game on the Market!! I love to play alot of cards but this is my FAVE :^) IT\'S a must have if you want easy to  challenging game play. The nicest looking and best UI that I have found. Great work Dev and many thanks for all the fun you\'ve brought us  :^) Keep them comming.
reviews.author: Karen Shrang

reviews.title: The game is good
reviews.comment: I really like playing this, its the best cribbage I have playeyed yet and it works great on my android. My only problem with it is many times the computer has missed points and I am unable to claim them. So just teach the computer how to count and it will be perfect.
reviews.author: Dayved Steffen
